name: BenX Sparrow
lastText: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment

name: Max Lynx
lastText: You can search throughout the entire universe for someone who is more deserving of your love and affection than you are yourself, and that person is not to be found anywhere. You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe deserve your love and affection.

name: Adam Bradleyson
lastText: Do keep the body in good health is a duty... otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.

name: Jamie Good
lastText: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.

name: Jortge
lastText: We are shaped by our thoughts; we become what we think. When the mind is pure, joy follows like a shadow that never leaves.

name: Jortge
lastText: There are only two mistakes one can make along the road to truth; not going all the way, and not starting.

name: Jortge
lastText: You will not be punished for your anger, you will be punished by your anger.

name: Jortge
lastText: Do not overrate what you have received, nor envy others. He who envies others does not obtain peace of mind.

name: Jortge
lastText: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.

name: Jortge
lastText: Those who are free of resentful thoughts surely find peace.

name: Jortge
lastText: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.
